org.apache.hadoop.io

Class SequenceFile.BlockCompressWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.io.SequenceFile.Writer
      • org.apache.hadoop.io.SequenceFile.BlockCompressWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Syncable
    Enclosing class:
    SequenceFile

    static class SequenceFile.BlockCompressWriter
extends SequenceFile.Writer
    Write compressed key/value blocks to a sequence-format file.
